valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 15 Dec 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 16 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 966 moving rather quickly east, expected Southeast Iceland 974 by 1800 Monday. New low expected Plymouth 977 by same time
